title: Demi Vollering, Jonas Vingegaard Win Velo d’Or Prizes for 2023’s Best Racers
content:
Mathieu van der Poel and Lotte Kopecky earn laurels as best one-day racers in the prestigious cycling awards dating back to 1992.

Read the full article at Demi Vollering, Jonas Vingegaard Win Velo d’Or Prizes for 2023’s Best Racers on Velo.
author: ahood
